thread.title: Vi
thread.title_full: Traffic School 4 Busy People reviewed by Vi

author: Vi
title: Vi
text: The lessons are clear. Good materials. I passed the test with perfect score and learned a thing or two. The result was sent out promptly to the court house. I called the court house to check a few days after the test and was told my case was closed. Thanks so much for a good job. I highly recommend Traffic School 4 Busy People.
